issue.title: [R] Add binding for str_pad()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13171](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13171). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Should work like [stringr::str_pad()](https://stringr.tidyverse.org/reference/str_pad.html). Should call different of the kernels added in ARROW-12716 depending on the value of the `side` argument.
